title: Encyclopedia of small business
subject: Small business -- Management$$QSmall business -- Management -- Encyclopedias
Small business -- Finance$$QSmall business -- Finance -- Encyclopedias
format: 1 online resource (2 volumes (xiv, 1257 pages)) : color illustrations, maps
description: Provides entrepreneurs with how-to information that they can apply to their own business. Features revised and expanded coverage to reflect the most current small business topics.

abstract: Provides entrepreneurs with how-to information that they can apply to their own business. Features revised and expanded coverage to reflect the most current small business topics.
